comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Withycombe was inaugurated as Governor of Oregon on January 12, 1915. Chief Justice Moore administered the oath. Thompson was president of the senate. See gesswhoto.com/star1915-jan22.html This is likely outside the State Capitol in Salem, Oregon.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: McArthur is en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clifton_Nesmith_McArthur who served in the Oregon legislature and as an Oregon Member of the U.S. Congress A photo when younger is at boundless.uoregon.edu/cdm4/item_viewer.php?CISOROOT=/univ...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: An arena at the University of Oregon was named after McArthur. See www.oregonlive.com/O/index.ssf/2010/03/uos_mcarthur_court... Built in 1927, McArthur Court has recently seen its last basketball game.
